name: Grand Piano
description: This grand piano delivers a rich and full sound, perfect for concert performances. It features a solid spruce soundboard and a responsive action mechanism.

name: Upright Piano
description: This upright piano is ideal for smaller spaces while still offering a powerful and resonant sound. It includes a solid spruce soundboard and high-quality hammers.

name: Digital Piano
description: This digital piano provides a realistic acoustic piano feel with advanced digital features. It includes multiple voices, recording capabilities, and connectivity options.

name: Stage Piano
description: This stage piano is designed for live performances with high-quality samples and a sturdy build. It features a wide range of voices and effects for versatile performance.

name: Baby Grand Piano
description: This baby grand piano offers the elegance of a grand piano in a more compact size. It features a solid spruce soundboard and a responsive action for excellent playability.
